snippet: Authorities are pursuing more cases involving handguns that fire rubber bullets out of concern that they are primarily being bought by migrants from the former Soviet republics.
abstract: Russian authorities are pursuing more cases involving handguns that fire rubber bullets out of concern that they are primarily being bought by migrants from former Soviet republics.
lead_paragraph: Authorities are pursuing more cases involving handguns that fire rubber bullets out of concern that they are primarily being bought by migrants from the former Soviet republics.

headline.seo: Ethnic Tension Drives Russian Crackdown on Rubber-Bullet Guns
headline.main: Ethnic Tension Drives Russian Crackdown on Rubber-Bullet Guns
headline.print_headline: Ethnic Tension Drives Russian Crackdown on Rubber-Bullet Guns
